name: Fuse Frenzy
description:
Use WASD or arrows to control your mechanic.  Jump with spacebar.  You can run past fuses to fix them, no keys needed.  Yes you have a double jump!

You have 120 seconds to get to 10 fuses and keep the monster from destroying the world!  Your high score is the lowest time it took to fix 10 fuses!

*** Check out the DevLog!!
